attributes.action: Legislate UK Abattoirs to declare Religious Slaughter whether stunned/un-stunned
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/halal-and-kosher-slaughter

it must take place in a slaughterhouse (abattoir) approved by the Food Standards Agency (FSA)

it must be done by someone who has a certificate of competence (CoC)

the slaughter must be done in a way that follows Jewish or Islamic religious practice
    
the meat must be intended for consumption by Jews or Muslims
attributes.background: Currently DEFRA have legislation with regards to Religious Slaughter and exemptions for Jews/Muslims in the UK.  This is applicable to the use of Non-Stun.  However many UK abattoirs use stunning methods that are acceptable for muslims depending on the Halal Certification provider.
